Compatible with iOS 9 and 10
Compatible with iPhone and iPad

With CustomTime+, you can customize the time string in the status bar. A lot of configurable options are included.

So what exactly can you do with CustomTime+?

1. Along with the clock, you can set CustomTime+ to show the date as well.

2. Along with the clock, you can set CustomTime+ to show your current IP-address as well.

3. Along with the clock, you can set CustomTime+ to show your device's free memory, both in MB but also in percentage.

4. Write a totally custom time string with plain text.

5. Combine multiple options!

See the included formatting guide in the preferences for more information :)

Compared to other tweaks, this tweak will not drain battery. That's also basically something nobody wants to happen, right?

Feel free to follow me on Twitter for the latest updates (@ijapija00)

Also, feel free to add my public repo (to achieve fast bug fixes, betas and the latest updates faster). Add http://cydia.ijapija00.com in Cydia.
